gridTitle: State of Unreal 2025 - Highlights for Fortnite Creators
description: Check out the latest UEFN news from this year’s State of Unreal, including exciting IPs, powerful new features, and more for Fortnite creators.

gridTitle: Introducing the LEGO® Brick Editor and LEGO Bloom Tycoon Template for Fortnite Creators!
description: Brick-by-brick LEGO building is coming to UEFN! Plus, there’s a new LEGO template to help you create the garden or farm of your dreams.
Check out the first in a new series of blog posts providing more transparency into Fortnite Discover. First up: a look at our vision and goals.
